body.name: WNH Smart Watch 1.8'' Large Display, Smart Watches for Women Men with 60dB Clear Calls, 24/7 Health Monitoring, Fitness Tracking, Waterproof Fitness Tracker Watch for Android iOS
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 34 mins
features: ✅【Advanced Health Monitoring】Take control of your wellness with our smart watch's 24/7 health monitoring. Enjoy peace of mind through continuous tracking of heart rate, blood oxygen, stress, and sleep. Receive immediate alerts for any health irregularities, enabling you to act swiftly and maintain your health.

✅【Dynamic Fitness Tracking】Track your workouts and hit your goals with ease. Our fitness tracker watch is the essential fitness ally, accurately recognizing over 120 different exercises, capturing data like distance, speed, and calories burned, and assisting you in optimizing your fitness plan for improved results.

✅【High-Precision Sensors】Experience precise health and fitness tracking with our smart watch, which boast cutting-edge heart rate chips and 3D sensors, paired with advanced algorithms. This powerful combination achieves multi-dimensional insights with exceptional precision, ensuring accurate readings across all skin tones.

✅【Crystal-Clear Bluetooth Calling】Powered by Bluetooth 5.3 for stable connectivity. Our smart watches for men women come with 60dB loundspeakers and noise-canceling mics, ensuring clarity in every call. Receive emails/texts/alerts right to your watch, keeping you informed and connected.

✅【Long-Lasting Battery Life】One charge lasts for half a month, say goodbye to charging worries. Our smart watches for women men boast 300mAh battery capacity, a full charge takes only 2.5 hours, enjoy up to 14 days of battery life in standard mode, and a full week under heavy usage.

✅【Expansive 1.8'' Display】Enjoy the vibrant detail on 1.8'' large display of our smart watch, which boasts a crisp 240x284 resolution. Designed for clear visibility even in bright sunlight, ensuring your fitness data and notifications are effortlessly readable at a glance.

✅【Water/Dust/Sweat Resistant】Enjoy your workouts anytime, anywhere. With an IP68 rating, this smart watch stands up to dust, water, and sweat. Whether you're at the gym or caught in the rain, your activity tracking remains accurate and uninterrupted. Compatible with iOS 9.0+ and Android 6.0+.

✅【Personalized Watch Faces】This smart watch features over 120 cloud-based watch faces for you to choose from, or you can personalize your display with your favorite images. Customize it to complement your mood, outfit, or occasion, making your smartwatch a versatile accessory for every look and lifestyle.

✅【Trustworthy After-Sales】Once purchased, you are our valued customer entitled to lifetime after-sales service. Should you have any queries or require technical help, contact us via Amazon messages or the contact information in the user manual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unrivaled Performance on a Budget: A 5-Star Smartwatch Delight Under $60!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this smartwatch, and I am absolutely thrilled with its performance. From the moment I unboxed it, I was impressed. The watch arrived 100% charged, sparing me the initial wait time to start using it. Setting it up was a breeze – it effortlessly synced with my smartphone through the VeryFit app.The bright display caught my attention immediately, making it easy to read in any lighting condition. What truly sets this smartwatch apart is its customizable features, allowing me to tailor it to my preferences effortlessly. I've enabled all the features, including heart rate monitoring, weather updates, blood oxygen levels, and sleep tracking. Surprisingly, the battery life is exceptional, lasting about 10 days on a single charge.The wristband provided is a perfect blend of durability, lightweight design, and comfort. Having previously owned an Apple watch, I can confidently say that this smartwatch rivals it in terms of functionality at a fraction of the cost. The added bonus of seamless integration with Alexa adds another layer of convenience to my daily activities.If I were to nitpick, I'd express a desire for more bandwidth to accommodate additional "Watch Faces." The current selection is great, but a bit more variety would be appreciated. Additionally, the motion sensor for the display activation can be hit or miss when I flip my wrist. However, considering the incredible value at under $60, these minor inconveniences are easily overlooked.In summary, this smartwatch earns a solid five stars from me. It delivers outstanding performance, impressive battery life, and a sleek design—all at an unbeatable price point. Pound for pound, it's a top-notch device, and I highly recommend it to anyone in search of a reliable and affordable smartwatch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars solid, nice looking, stats heavy, watch to track
reviews.reviewText: This is such a nice and beautiful smartwatch !!It will connect to either an Android device or Apple device, so pretty much all your bases are covered there. I've used it about two weeks, I am very happy with it so far.The screen is clear, large enough to read and very responsive to touch and movement. The colors are vibrant. The app works great and is easy to use.The health functions are working. It tracks steps, oxygen levels, heart rate, and monitors sleep patterns and also has a great battery life. So far the watch is serving its purpose without any issues.The WNH is a solid, nice looking, stats heavy, watch to track and hopefully improve your health with. It would make a wonderful gift for yourself, family, or friends. I sincerely recommend it! Enjoy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly Great Value for the Price
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure what to expect out of a smart watch at a $60 price point but boy was I not disappointed!It has a sleek look that pretty clearly aims for that sleek apple watch appearance. In fact, from a distance it's hard to tell that it's not an apple watch. It has all the smart watch features that you would expect:activity tracking, heart rate monitor, sleep monitor, weather, music control, call/message alerts, etc.I am pleasantly surprised at the quality, appearance, and feel. Charging is easy and battery life is much longer than my smart phone. Overall, this is a great little device to free up your hands while staying connected. Would recommend 5/5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: WNH smartwatch is a very good alternative for an apple watch. It’s also budget friendly, which was my main focus when choosing this watch. When initially opening and turning on the watch I was surprised it came with a 100% charge. The watch is solidly built and not too bulky. I love how it comes with many features like call log, activity or exercise tracker, heart rate tracker, music player, and more. The interface of the watch is very simple and easy to use unlike other budget watches I’ve tried. The thing I loved most about the WNH watch is the notification center and camera control button, I’ve never seen any other budget watch that’s had these features!! I’m so glad I got this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Smart Watch! Highly Recommend!
reviews.reviewText: I am simply amazed! This smart watch has all the features and more than the high priced smartwatches: Complete Health monitoring, fitness tracking, waterproof, crystal clear phone calls to make calls and receive calls, battery is long lasting, great crisp display high resolution, notifications from social media websites, plays music, Alex built in, weather, stress, light weight with a smooth comfortable wrist band! The quality is also amazing for this sale price! I have tested the features and it is very accurate with the! Also, if you register the watch you get an extended warranty! I highly recommend this watch! All around is a great buy connected to your phone through Bluetooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Features included only found in more expensive watches
reviews.reviewText: This watch packs a lot of features only found in much more expensive watches. The heart beat sensor is a great useful feature. The oxygen level sensor is not even found in my more expensive watch. Both are easy to use and the Android partner app keeps your history of the measurements. This watch seems to do everything (get weather, remote to music player, text messages, connect with phone calls) and it is incredible at this price point. The Android app has 100s of watch faces that you can download both free and ones for a small charge. The watch connects with the app via Bluetooth and pairing was easy and quick. The battery is listed at 150 hours and after over a week of usage I was only down to 35%. Buying this watch was a great find.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I couldn't program the watch and I have previously programed 5 fitbits. Sending back guess it is smarter than the average bear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value...awesome product!
reviews.reviewText: I really like this watch. It is a great value compared to the other smart watches. The functionality is the same as the more expensive brands for a fraction of the price. It has a sleek look and comfortable band. Add Alexa to increase the range of this fun addition to your tech. I like that it also has several options for the face to switch up the look. It is very easy to operate. Additionally, the battery seems to hold up really well.
